name: generate_story
description: Generates a brief story which relates to a binary music type.

name: search_itunes
description: search for certain results in itunes

term.description: The URL-encoded text string you want to search for.

country.description: The two-letter country code for the store you want to search.

media.description: The media type you want to search for.

entity.description: The type of results you want returned, relative to the specified media type.Possible options: podcast, music, musicVideo, audiobook, shortFilm, tvShow, software, ebook, all.

attribute.description: The attribute you want to search for in the stores, relative to the specified media type.Possible options: podcast, music, musicVideo, audiobook, shortFilm, tvShow, software, ebook, all.

limit.description: The number of search results you want the iTunes Store to return.

lang.description: The language, English or Japanese, you want to use when returning search results.Possible options: en_us, ja_jp.

explicit.description: A flag indicating whether or not you want to include explicit content in your search results.

name: ask_to_user
description: You can ask user for guidance when you think you need more information to handle the task, but you should use this tool as less as you can.

question.description: The question you want to ask to user.

name: finish
description: Finish the task and give your answer.
